full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Electrical Products for New Brunswick
==============================

# Title (English)
Electrical Products (New Brunswick)

# Title (French)
Produits électriques (Nouveau-Brunswick)

# Public Notice Details
=================================

* Contract Reference Number: PW-22-01017776
* Government of Canada Solicitation Number: W2037-23148N
* Tender Closing Date: [Expired] - 2023-01-16T13:00:00
* Publication Date: 2022-12-19

# Product Category and Purchase Requirements
------------------------------------------

This tender is for the purchase of electrical products for the Department of National Defence in New Brunswick. The tender is open only to approved Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under the SA E60HN-16ELEC contract.

# Approved Suppliers
-------------------

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Anixter Canada Inc.
* Graybar Canada
* Nedco-Rexel
* Wesco
* Lumen
* Eddy Group
* KGPCo
* Newark Element 14
* Westburne-Rexel
* ECS Electrical
* Bird Stairs
* KVA Protection
* Allied Electronics

# Purchasing Manager Contact Information
--------------------------------------

To obtain more information, please contact:

* Name: Nicole Shannon
* Job Title: Contracting Officer
* Email: [nicole.shannon@forces.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.shannon@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 506-422-2000 ext 7075

# Official Documents and Files
------------------------------

Please find the original Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) documents available for download at the following links:

* English Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/85e5bf8ddba9d2d7fdd93568a1712672/20221216_cfsme_22148n_npp_e.pdf
* French Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/6e0686094a4d9c6e60fe01d9f6bdd9f8/20221216_cfsme_22148n_npp_f.pdf

Note: This tender has already expired.	Marked as "[Expired]". 
The original text format is cringeworthy to readability. Stylistic
